Orders

The Orders API contains resources related to creating, submitting, and processing orders.

The Orders API generally follows these conventions:

  • Updates are generally performed via PATCH and are partial; full (PUT) updates are not supported.
  • Recodesentations returned in the response body of GET operations are fairly detailed, containing read-only fields and hierarchical structures.
  • For convenience, the same detailed recodesentations returned by GET operations are also returned in the response body of PATCH operations.
